name: Fox Gets High
description:
Rotate the fox so that he jumps over the dogs. Succeeding delivers a burst of whatever the fox is under the influence.

Submission for the Weekly Hour Game Jam W2 2017.

I exploded the clock, wanting to animate two models that weren't even rigged. Finally I could use the fox rig using a ragdoll.

External assets:

Feels Like We Only Go Backwards by Tame Impala

Lowpoly fox by Vladhad

Low poly doggy by Joe McDowall

For next time:

  1. Stop complicated ideas.
